title: Trashed
description: Eisner-nominated true stories about a side of society most people try not to think about. Garbage collector turned comic artist Derf shares tales about his experiences collecting garbage in a rural Midwest town after graduating from high school. Disgusting, fascinating, shocking and hilarious, Trashed shows readers a world that words alone could never capture, but spares them the horrible smell.
author: Derf Backderf
